dict.acceptation: 辩论；仔细考虑；思考；盘算；

sent.orig: We can debate and re-debate the rights or wrongs of removing Saddam.
sent.trans: 关于推翻萨达姆政权的是非对错，我们还可继续讨论。

sent.orig: There has been much debate about the terms used in the debate.
sent.trans: 对辩论中使用的术语存在着许多争议。

sent.orig: The debate teams can bring in any props for the debate.
sent.trans: 辩论方能使用任何道具协助说明。

sent.orig: Post-debate polls will explore the American public's verdict on the debate, in coming days.
sent.trans: 而几天以后的民调结果将显示美国公众对辩论会的看法。

sent.orig: The debate will be over priorities, transcending the longstanding debate between idealism and realism.
sent.trans: 解决这一问题至关重要，它凌驾于长期以来关于理想主义和现实主义的讨论之上。
